Credits∵

A Credit resource represents a transaction consisting of sending money to a bank account.

Credits have a status attribute representing the current status of the credit throughout the payout process. There are three possible status values:

pending
As soon as the credit is created through the API, the status shows as pending. This indicates that Balanced received the information for the credit and will begin processing. The ACH network itself processes transactions in a batch format. Batch submissions are processed at 3pm PST on business days. If the credit is created after 3pm PST, it will not be submitted for processing until 3pm PST the next business day.
succeeded
One business day after the batch submission, the status will change to succeeded. That is the expected status of the credit. If the account number and routing number were entered correctly, the money should in fact be available to the seller. However, there is no immediate confirmation regarding the transaction showing up in the seller's account successfully.
failed
The seller's bank has up to three business days from when the money should be available to indicate a rejection along with the rejection reason. Unfortunately, not all banks comply with ACH network policies and may respond after three business days with a rejection. As soon as Balanced receives the rejection, the status is updated to failed.

Available Query Filters
amount

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=, in, !in

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

created_at

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

meta

Available Operations: contains, !contains

Default Operation: contains

Sortable: False

status

Available Operations: in, !in, =

Default Operation: in

Sortable: False

transaction_number

Available Operations: =, !=, startswith, endswith, contains, !contains, in, !in, ilike, !ilike

Default Operation: =

Sortable: False

note
Bank accounts that only receive credits do not need to be verified.

Create a Credit∵

Send money to a bank account.

amount
required integer. The amount of the credit in cents.
appears_on_statement_as

optional string. Text that will appear on the buyer's statement. Characters that can be used are limited to:

  • ASCII letters (a-z and A-Z)
  • Digits (0-9)
  • Special characters (.<>(){}[]+&!$;-%_?:#@~=\'" ^`|)

Any other characters will be rejected. Debits - Truncated to 18 characters. Credits - Truncated to 14 characters.

All Visa, Master Card, Discover, American Express debits will have a prefix of "BAL*" e.g. "BAL*marketplace.com".

ACH debits and credits do not have a prefix.

American Express pending transactions will be shown as "BALANCED INC". AMEX pending transactions are hidden by default in the American Express web portal. Once the debit is settled it will convert to "BAL*<appears_on_statement_as>".

destination
optional string. The funding destination for this credit
order
optional string. The order this credit is associated with

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id/credits

Balanced::BankAccount.credit

balanced.BankAccount().credit()

balanced.get().credit()

BankAccount().credit(Map<String, Object> payload)

Balanced\BankAccount->credits->create()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/BA4hsJuMGxKhbUSZ34pQJgE0/credits \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "amount=5000"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA6S1rsNWTCwBugJqjBNQbJU')
bank_account.credit(:amount => 5000)

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA6bLGpQZPOiTNRxF24rMd9m')
bank_account.credit(
  amount=5000
)

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/bank_accounts/BA4hsJuMGxKhbUSZ34pQJgE0').credit()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/bank_accounts/BA4JCiiAb4alhWMlZSv9POAU");

HashMap<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 5000);

try {
    Credit credit = bankAccount.credit(payload);
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccount::get("/bank_accounts/BA3BkV8D5D77J22Ktzx8lyI0");
$bank_account->credits->create(array(
    "amount" => "5000",
));

?>

Example Response

{
    "credits": [
        {
            "amount": 5000, 
            "appears_on_statement_as": "example.com", 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:43.050183Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "description": null, 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/credits/CR4SGc4QLwPOfpRTSZt3c098", 
            "id": "CR4SGc4QLwPOfpRTSZt3c098", 
            "links": {
                "customer": "CU4fnEqSkJ1GtfI9yjBE0lpC", 
                "destination": "BA4hsJuMGxKhbUSZ34pQJgE0", 
                "order": null
            }, 
            "meta": {}, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "CR250-517-3085", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:43.626235Z"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "credits.customer": "/customers/{credits.customer}", 
        "credits.destination": "/resources/{credits.destination}", 
        "credits.events": "/credits/{credits.id}/events", 
        "credits.order": "/orders/{credits.order}", 
        "credits.reversals": "/credits/{credits.id}/reversals"
    }
}

Fetch a Credit∵

Fetch a previously created credit.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/credits/:credit_id

Balanced::Credit.fetch

balanced.Credit.fetch()

balanced.get()

Credit(String uri)

Balanced\Credit::get()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/credits/CR4SGc4QLwPOfpRTSZt3c098 \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

credit = Balanced::Credit.fetch('/credits/CR7sdDSiBjguD4MM6NtfcGs6')

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

credit = balanced.Credit.fetch('/credits/CR5XXPwA1ckaTDSIg3593sEx')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/credits/CR4SGc4QLwPOfpRTSZt3c098')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Credit credit = new Credit("/credits/CR4wyLukORa0TXhCYtjZrfw5");

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$credit = Balanced\Credit::get("/credits/CR3jlMtcAQzaonIVb40vT0FP");

?>

Example Response

{
    "credits": [
        {
            "amount": 5000, 
            "appears_on_statement_as": "example.com", 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:43.050183Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "description": null, 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/credits/CR4SGc4QLwPOfpRTSZt3c098", 
            "id": "CR4SGc4QLwPOfpRTSZt3c098", 
            "links": {
                "customer": "CU4fnEqSkJ1GtfI9yjBE0lpC", 
                "destination": "BA4hsJuMGxKhbUSZ34pQJgE0", 
                "order": null
            }, 
            "meta": {}, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "CR250-517-3085", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:43.626235Z"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "credits.customer": "/customers/{credits.customer}", 
        "credits.destination": "/resources/{credits.destination}", 
        "credits.events": "/credits/{credits.id}/events", 
        "credits.order": "/orders/{credits.order}", 
        "credits.reversals": "/credits/{credits.id}/reversals"
    }
}

List All Credits∵

Fetch a list of all previously created credits. The credits are returned in sorted order, with the most recent credits appearing first.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/credits

Balanced::Credit.all

balanced.Credit.query

balanced.marketplace.credits

Credit.Collection(String href)

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->credits

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/credits \
      -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
      -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

credits = Balanced::Credit.all

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

credits = balanced.Credit.query

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplace.credits

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Credit.Collection credits = new Credit.Collection(Credit.resource_href);

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$credits = $marketplace->credits->query()->all();

?>

Example Response

{
    "credits": [
        {
            "amount": 5000, 
            "appears_on_statement_as": "example.com", 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:43.050183Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "description": null, 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/credits/CR4SGc4QLwPOfpRTSZt3c098", 
            "id": "CR4SGc4QLwPOfpRTSZt3c098", 
            "links": {
                "customer": "CU4fnEqSkJ1GtfI9yjBE0lpC", 
                "destination": "BA4hsJuMGxKhbUSZ34pQJgE0", 
                "order": null
            }, 
            "meta": {}, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "CR250-517-3085", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:43.626235Z"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "credits.customer": "/customers/{credits.customer}", 
        "credits.destination": "/resources/{credits.destination}", 
        "credits.events": "/credits/{credits.id}/events", 
        "credits.order": "/orders/{credits.order}", 
        "credits.reversals": "/credits/{credits.id}/reversals"
    }, 
    "meta": {
        "first": "/credits?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "href": "/credits?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "last": "/credits?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "limit": 10, 
        "next": null, 
        "offset": 0, 
        "previous": null, 
        "total": 1
    }
}

List All Credits for a Bank Account∵

Returns a list of previously created credits to a specific bank account. The credits are returned in sorted order, with the most recent credits appearing first.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id/credits

Balanced::BankAccount.credits

balanced.BankAccount().credits

balanced.get().credits

BankAccount().credits

Balanced\BankAccount->credits->query()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO/credits \
      -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
      -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA6JeIzD7zM6rmp0Nt8Mu9Sw')
credits = bank_account.credits

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA58WYAEUMrEtAkW5KAvWo5V/credits')
credits = bank_account.credits

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO').credits

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/bank_accounts/BA3LBmizwthrjehivn2ffzHU");
Credit.Collection credits = bankAccount.credits;

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccout::get("/bank_accounts/BA2M6q0hqFsbnpPbPb7xeQo6");
$bank_account->credits->query()->all();

?>

Example Response

{
    "links": {}, 
    "meta": {
        "first": "/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO/credits?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "href": "/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO/credits?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "last": "/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO/credits?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "limit": 10, 
        "next": null, 
        "offset": 0, 
        "previous": null, 
        "total": 0
    }
}

Update a Credit∵

Update information for an existing credit.

description
optional string. Free-text description of the credit for the dashboard.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/credits/:credit_id

Balanced::Credit.save

balanced.Credit().save()

balanced.get().save()

Credit().save()

Balanced\Credit->save()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/credits/CR4SGc4QLwPOfpRTSZt3c098 \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "description=New description for credit" \
     -d "meta[facebook.id]=1234567890" \
     -d "meta[anykey]=valuegoeshere"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

credit = Balanced::Credit.fetch('/credits/CR7sdDSiBjguD4MM6NtfcGs6')
credit.description = 'New description for credit'
credit.meta = {
    'anykey' => 'valuegoeshere',
    'facebook.id' => '1234567890'
}
credit.save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

credit = balanced.Credit.fetch('/credits/CR5XXPwA1ckaTDSIg3593sEx')
credit.meta = {
  'twitter.id': '1234987650',
  'facebook.user_id': '0192837465',
  'my-own-customer-id': '12345'
}
credit.save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/credits/CR4SGc4QLwPOfpRTSZt3c098').set('meta.my_id', '123123123').save()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Credit credit = new Credit("/credits/CR4wyLukORa0TXhCYtjZrfw5");

Map<String, String> meta = new HashMap<String, String>();
meta.put("facebook.id", "1234567890");
meta.put("anykey", "valuegoeshere");

credit.meta = meta;
credit.description = "New description for credit";

try {
    credit.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$credit = Balanced\Credit::get("/credits/CR3jlMtcAQzaonIVb40vT0FP");
$credit->description = 'New description for credit';
$credit->meta = array(
    "anykey" => "valuegoeshere",
    "facebook.id" => "1234567890",
);
$credit->save();

?>

Example Response

{
    "credits": [
        {
            "amount": 5000, 
            "appears_on_statement_as": "example.com", 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:43.050183Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "description": "New description for credit", 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/credits/CR4SGc4QLwPOfpRTSZt3c098", 
            "id": "CR4SGc4QLwPOfpRTSZt3c098", 
            "links": {
                "customer": "CU4fnEqSkJ1GtfI9yjBE0lpC", 
                "destination": "BA4hsJuMGxKhbUSZ34pQJgE0", 
                "order": null
            }, 
            "meta": {
                "anykey": "valuegoeshere", 
                "facebook.id": "1234567890"
            }, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "CR250-517-3085", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:48.484726Z"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "credits.customer": "/customers/{credits.customer}", 
        "credits.destination": "/resources/{credits.destination}", 
        "credits.events": "/credits/{credits.id}/events", 
        "credits.order": "/orders/{credits.order}", 
        "credits.reversals": "/credits/{credits.id}/reversals"
    }
}
